ModMetaData.name: WeaponsOfChoice - Dev Build
ModMetaData.author: EntityFramework
ModMetaData.description: A revamped version of WeaponsAndOutfits. This time the weapons configuration are not part of the apparel outfit system. (This is the dev version of WeaponsOfChoice. The release version of About.xml is available for editing at About/About-Release.xml. Edits made on this file or on the temporary About/About.xml won't show up on the release version. Use VisualStudio to build a "Release" version of this mod when ready to upload your mod!)
